verbose_text: The lower expression of HvWRKY10 might suggest that 100 mM NaCl treatment might not be enough to trigger the expression of this transcription factor (TFs) and/or HvWRKY10 transcription factors might only response to seedling stage salt stress, but this postulation needs to be further examined.
evidence: NaCl treatment might not be enough to trigger the expression of this transcription factor (TFs) and/or HvWRKY10 transcription
